listing.listing_description:
Brand new timber architecture and luxury amenities frame stunning mountain views at The Overlook Chalet. This recently built Breckenridge vacation rental has beautifully appointed entertaining spaces and six bedrooms with space for up to twenty-two friends and family. Its location in the Peak 8 area puts you close to skiing, plus shopping and dining on the town’s Main Street.

Spacious outdoor living areas let you make the most of the Colorado summer, with a private deck, al-fresco dining for eight, plus an outdoor fireplace and hot tub for cooler evenings. If you’ll be visiting during cooler weather, leave gear in the mudroom and unwind by the wet bar, TV and sound system, or around the pool table and collection of arcade games.

Inside The Overlook Chalet, soaring ceilings and an open-concept layout mean you can enjoy the views from the living room, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. Cozy up to the gas fireplace on the sofa or loveseat, claim a stool at the breakfast bar and chat with the chef, or sit down to satisfy après-ski appetites at the elegant dining table.

The chalet has four bedrooms with king beds, including two master suites with fireplaces and balconies, one of which even has a honeymoon-worthy jetted tub. The fifth bedroom is a bunk room perfect for kids, with three double bunk beds, and the sixth bedroom has a trundle bed. All the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

Whether you’ll be exploring the mountains on skis or on foot, a holiday at The Overlook Chalet makes it easy. The villa is just over a 5-minute walk to the nearest ski run, and a short drive from the Breckenridge Ski Resort base, the BreckConnect gondola and Copper Mountain. Go sledding and tubing at nearby Carter Park or, in warmer weather, play a round at Breckenridge Golf Club. For shopping and dining, make the short drive to Main Street in charming central Breckenridge.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Mountain scenery meets modern art at The Lion Vail - 2 Bedroom Residence. Part of The Lion, Vail Valley's newest luxury community, this stunning vacation rental offers both a sleek contemporary ambience and a location just minutes from some of Colorado's best skiing. The two bedrooms are the perfect size for two couples on holiday together, a small family or even a honeymoon-style escape to the Rockies.

Guests of The Lion are welcome to use the community's shared indoor pool, indoor and outdoor hot tubs, gym, steam room, games room, business center and children's room. If you'd prefer, you can also leave gear in the villa's private ski lockers and spend evenings relaxing by the fireplace and TV or, on warmer nights, watching the stars come out from the furnished balcony.

The residence is laid out around a central open-concept great room, whose high ceilings and large windows frame views of the mountains. Mid-century-influenced pieces, like a sculptural lounge chair and Tulip dining table, lend mod style to the living and dining areas. In the fully equipped kitchen, walnut cabinets and granite countertops make an equally chic statement.

The 2 Bedroom Residence has one master bedroom with a king bed and fireplace, and one bedroom that can be arranged with a king bed or two double beds. Both bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

Skiers will appreciate that The Lion is less than a 5-minute walk from two ski lifts and Lionshead Village, and a 5-minute drive from Vail Ski Resort. If you'll be visiting in the warmer months, you'll find Vail Golf Club and the Betty Ford Alpine Gardens. Find shopping, dining and entertainment year-round in Vail Village, a 5-minute drive from the villa.

Business License Number: 003670

listing.listing_description:
Look out onto slopes that are just minutes away at Breck Escape. While this Colorado vacation rental feels secluded, it’s a 10-minute drive or less from skiing, golf, and shopping and dining along Main Street in Breckenridge. With open-concept living areas and six bedrooms, the villa has plenty of space for groups of up to eighteen friends or extended family.

For summer visitors, the villa has furnished outdoor living areas with a barbecue and hot tub. If you’re here for the skiing, leave gear in the mud room, pour a glass from the wine cooler and relax after a day on the slopes with the help of the steam room, pool table, cable TV and Wi-Fi.

A bright, airy great room gives you the luxury of enough space for everyone to be together. Cozy up to the fireplace in the sitting area or watch the snow fall on the trees outside, plan the next day’s adventures around the dining table or pause for a snack at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. The separate media room is just the right place for kids to watch a movie while the grown-ups catch up.

Breck Escape has four bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite with honeymoon-suite-worthy details like a fireplace and lounge area. The fifth bedroom has a queen bed, twin bunk bed and en-suite bathroom, making it perfect for parents traveling with younger children. For older kids, there’s a bunk room with two twin bunk beds and two trundle beds.

Start each day of your ski holiday by making the 8-minute drive to the BreckConnect gondola or the 10-minute drive to the base of Breckenridge Ski Resort. For après-ski shopping and dining, it’s only 10 minutes to the town’s Main Street and the Breckenridge National Historic District. In warmer weather, it’s a 9-minute trip to the Breckenridge Golf Club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Looking for a secluded escape within minutes of the world-famous attractions in one of the most popular and visited cities in America? No problem. From its hillside perch, Beverly Grove enjoys scenic city views, easy access to the wonders of Los Angeles, as well as a private location. This Beverly Hills three-bedroom is the perfect family getaway, couples retreat, or honeymoon destination.

Beverly Grove is a recently rebuilt smart home, outfitted with state of the art technology and top of the line designer furnishings. The white color scheme, complete with French white oak flooring, displays the iconic class and elegance of the architectural style with which Beverly Hills has become synonymous. The open concept floor plan, high ceilings, and floor-to-ceiling windows make Beverly Grove feel even more spacious, especially when the doors to the balcony are slid open, inviting fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight. Although the villa can seem quite formal at times, its also possesses a calming quality that will surely melt all your stress away. And, if you’d like an even more relaxing space, head down the wooden staircase that leads to the teahouse and koi pond.

If you’re thinking of hosting an elegant dinner soiree, Beverly Grove is the ideal co-host, with its fully equipped kitchen, formal dining area, wet bar, barbecue, and espresso machine, you’ll have everything you need. The fireplace and sound system provide classic atmosphere inside, while the swimming pool, hot tub, and outdoor lounge are perfect for a little after dinner fun on the terrace. And, Beverly Grove comes with an elevator and parking garage.

Within ten miles of your luxurious hillside home, you’ll find downtown Hollywood, Rodeo Drive, Universal Studios, the Sunset Strip, and so much more. If you’re in the mood for a day on the beach, Santa Monica Pier, Venice Beach, and Malibu Pier are all just a short drive from home. And, if you’d like to explore one of California’s most breathtaking natural environments, Topanga State Park is just thirteen miles from Beverly Grove.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Relax into the SoCal lifestyle at Coastal Captivation. Set just 100 yards from Windansea Beach, this San Diego vacation rental gives you sunny outdoor living spaces, a horizon dotted with palm trees and sunset views over the Pacific. Whether you’ll be sunbathing or sightseeing, this custom-built home ensures that you’ll be staying in luxury.

The most entrancing part of Coastal Captivation is its rooftop deck, which has lounging and dining areas, a hot tub, an outdoor kitchen with barbecue and panoramic ocean views. (A dumbwaiter makes it a snap to transport snacks, beverages and more up to the third level.) If you’re not barbecuing, you can still enjoy a soundtrack of waves with dinner at the al-fresco table just off the great room on the second-floor deck.

The great room itself is sleek and modern, from a sloped-arm sectional facing the flat-screen television to a clean-lined dining table that seats six. A fold-away glass wall opens the space to warm breezes from the deck outside, and a bright-hued painting picks up the vivid blues of the ocean. The beachy vibe continues in the fully equipped contemporary kitchen, where buoy-like glass pendants hang over a convenient island and breakfast bar.

Three bedrooms on two floors make your holiday a comfortable one. The honeymoon-style master suite on the first floor has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, gas fireplace and a private balcony with lounge furniture. On the second floor, you’ll find one bedroom with a king bed and shared bathroom, and one bedroom with two bunk beds and an en-suite that’s perfect for kids.

Whether you’ve come to California for a family vacation, a getaway with friends or even a honeymoon, there’s plenty to see and do around Coastal Captivation. There are five beaches within 20 miles of the villa, including Windansea Beach, just a few minutes’ walk away, and landmark Coronado Island. The closest shopping and dining is in downtown La Jolla, less than 10 minutes away. For day trips, try San Diego-La Jolla Underwater Park, one of several nearby golf courses, the historic neighborhoods in San Diego, or the famed San Diego Zoo.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
There’s a certain style of rugged-luxury that exists in the Napa Valley, and this breezy wine country-home captures it perfectly. Spend your nights under the stars, tasting all the local vineyards best creations while the fire warms you. Use the trendy kitchen to craft locally-inspired meals. But First, head 4-minutes into Saint Helena to pick up some fresh produce from the farmer’s market.

A-list interior decorator, Jay Jeffers, crafts a unique mixture of contemporary furnishings, antiques, and bold patterns, accents walls, and works of art in Casa Pelota. Sure to spark conversation, your dinner parties and social occasions will easily benefit from the vibrant decor. Especially when the terrace doors are slid open and the hosting space doubles.

Feeling active? Swim a few laps in the pool or challenge a friend to a match on the bocce court. After, celebrate your victory by recharging your batteries in the soothing hot tub. Depending on your vibe, Casa Pelota’s formal and alfresco dining tables are perfect on nights in; both have seating for 6. After dinner, turn up the sound system, get a fire going, and try a few more local wines.

First thing’s first, get out and find your new favorite vineyard. Napa Bike Tours and the Napa Wine Train are great ways to see a wide selection of wineries, and they don’t require a car. Then, dine at Harvest Table, a restaurant that prides itself on locally sourced ingredients and a beautiful terrace setting. After dinner, catch a flick at Cameo Cinema, which has been open since 1913.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Capture 180-degree ocean views from the prestigious corner of 7th and Strand, on Manhattan Beach. Steps from the sand, this contemporary villa is the dream boardwalk getaway. The sunny south-facing terrace is the perfect place to work on your tan. When you’re ready to explore, follow the boardwalk downtown for shopping and nightlife. Or, hop on a bike and visit Venice, Redondo, or Santa Monica.

The Glass Beach House combines nautical decor with industrial design to create a space that feels at one with its natural surroundings while showing off cutting-edge architecture. From inside, the ocean views are endless. Outside, the social terrace feels at one with the vibrant “walk-streets” in the Manhattan Beach community. The formal dining area quickly becomes alfresco by sliding the ocean-facing door open. After dinner, the kids will love playing in the children’s loft, while you sip wine as the sun sets.

If you get lucky, you may spot dolphins, seals, and even grey whales from the beachside terrace. For a closer look, grab a surfboard or stand-up paddleboard from the backyard and hit the ocean. After a morning on the beach, head into LA to do some shopping on Rodeo Drive, or have lunch at The Grove. At night, find a casual pub in Venice or head to one of the legendary clubs on Hollywood’s Sunset Strip.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that there is construction underway at a neighbouring property. Dolphin Sunset will experience noise, depending on what work is being done at the time. Please inquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

An easy spot for family gatherings, this modern-meets-rustic home encapsulates the laid-back, Southern California lifestyle. Natural wood, stone, and cream-coloured minimalist décor detail the interior, while high fencing and thick shrubbery give the backyard a totally private feel. Walk for miles along the beachfront, indulge your inner shopaholic and discover new restaurants on nearby Prospect Street, or delight the kids and make the 4-minute drive to San Diego-La Jolla Underwater Park. 

Enormous glass doors to the front courtyard and back veranda open up completely, giving the feeling of an open, flowing space—both inside and out. Soak the day away in the azure-tiled hot tub or curl up with a book on one of the sunbeds. Tall trees, as well as a revolving parasol, provide extra shade for outdoor lounging. The Pacific ocean can be viewed from the 2nd floor terrace, with transparent railings that create an unobstructed look.

While enjoying cooler evenings outside, turn on the heat lamp and save yourself the trip to grab a sweater from the upstairs bedrooms. The gourmet kitchen, which features rust-coloured granite countertops, has the option of being pre-stocked prior to your arrival. Sip on a glass of local wine and get lost in stimulating conversation in front of the patio fire pit. A natural gas barbecue and alfresco dining area makes eating with the sunset a breeze.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Designed to make guests feel like they’re on the slopes, Sun Ridge Lodge offers incredible mountain views in a luxury ambience. Not only that, this Steamboat Springs vacation rental is just a few miles from Steamboat Ski Resort and the Thunderhead lift. Spacious indoor and outdoor living areas, ski storage and five bedrooms have plenty of room for up to fourteen friends and family members to relax and enjoy each other’s company.

After a day on the slopes, leave your gear in the ski lockers and enjoy a little friendly competition around the ping-pong table, video-game console or pool table. Serve refreshments from the wet bar or wine fridge to sip around the fireplace and flat-screen television. In warmer weather, linger outside on a large deck with a barbecue, sitting and dining areas, a hot tub, an outdoor fireplace, heat lamps and panoramic mountain views.

Sun Ridge Lodge has a classic Colorado mountain-cabin feel, but that doesn’t mean you have to sacrifice luxury. The villa’s exposed wooden beams and oversized windows frame breathtaking sunset views, as does the glass elevator. A double-height stone chimney and soft leather sofas are the perfect spot to cozy up after a day out in the snow, and an open-plan sitting area, dining room and kitchen have room for everyone to gather. The kitchen is fully equipped and has professional-grade appliances and a convenient separate breakfast bar.

The villa has three bedrooms with private en-suite bathrooms: two with king beds and inviting jetted tubs, and one with a queen bed. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two bunk beds, and share a bathroom, making them perfect for parents traveling with children or a group of cousins.

Though Steamboat Springs is known for some of the best powder in the country, you’ll find plenty to do no matter what time of year you visit. Spend your holiday on the slopes of Steamboat Ski Resort, less than 2 miles from Sun Ridge Lodge, or book a tee time at Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course to drive and putt amid incredible scenery. Don’t miss the town’s namesake hot springs, from the family-friendly slides at Old Town to the honeymoon-worthy natural rock pools at Strawberry Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a villa specialist.

Located on a quiet corner next to the heart of Old Town, this cozy alpine retreat boasts sweeping mountain and city views from multiple lookout points. Elegant décor, distinctive furniture, and dark hardwood flooring flows throughout. The elegant abode is just a short walk away from dining, shopping and nightlife on historic Main Street and mere steps to the slopes at Park City Mountain Resort. 

Vaulted ceilings alongside soaring windows enhance the open-concept space. Perfect for entertaining, the gourmet kitchen area features ceramic tiles, stone countertops, and eye-catching pendant lights. The sun-drenched main living area is a comfortable, bright place to gather. Sliding glass doors lead out to your private, high-reaching oasis where the crisp air is undeniably refreshing. Take a seat, uncork a bottle of wine, and get lost in the vivid sunsets that disappear behind the expansive vista. 

After a day of hitting the slopes, secure your spot on the sectional sofa and catch a game or watch a favourite flick in the media room. The family room is fully stocked with an assortment of board games so you can challenge your crew to a competitive (yet fun) evening. Give into total après-ski relaxation in the private hot tub, tucked away on the lower level, adjacent to the outdoor fire pit. During warmer months, hiking and biking trails can be explored, golf can be played, and the luge-like Alpine Slide is ready to give you a boost of adrenaline. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This superb Venice home is conveniently located within minutes of Abbot Kinney, Rose Avenue, and the Venice Canals. Spanning 4,363 square feet, the villa balances exquisite modern style with beautiful naturalistic accents, embodying the quintessence of this famed beachfront community in Southern California. Spacious and superbly appointed living areas include a fabulous rooftop terrace with alfresco dining and 360-degree views of Los Angeles and the Pacific Ocean. Excellent media and cooking technologies, central air conditioning, and a lovely home office create a comfortable environment for all guests. The villa's four bedroom suites accommodate families, business travelers, and groups of friends up to eight in size.

The roof terrace sets the scene for a vintage Venice getaway. Bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs and luxuriate on the canopied bed. Sip coffee in the morning light and cocktails in the sublime sunset hour. Prepare delicious barbeque meals at the outdoor kitchen, and relish them alfresco in the sea-kissed breeze. Linger outside deep into the night, sipping California wines amid the glitter of Los Angeles and the vast night sky.

The open-concept interior offers a cool, luminous haven for festive gatherings or private retreats. Magnificent wood-paneled ceilings harmonize with smooth stone floors, soothing white walls, and choice touches of vibrant color. Mid-century modern furnishings and light fixtures, along with a superb art collection, evoke a vintage Los Angeles ambiance. There are two comfortable lounge areas, including one with a fireplace and large TV, as well as a dining table for eight with gorgeous leather chairs. The kitchen features chef-grade appliances and a wonderful island breakfast bar.

The exceptional master suite includes a king bed, lounge area, furnished terrace, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, shower, and freestanding tub. There is one guest suite with a king bed and two suites with queen-size beds. All have ensuite bathrooms.

From the villa's two-car garage, you're within easy reach of Venice Beach (about seven minutes), Santa Monica Beach and Pier, and Marina del Rey. Los Angeles International Airport is less than six miles away, making the villa a convenient choice for wedding guests or weekend escapes.

listing.listing_description:
Watch the golfers on the Jack Nicklaus Course from the sunny patio of this modern mini-mansion in Kissimmee. Grill up something fresh for dinner while the kids splash around in the pool. Later, melt any leftover stress away in the hot tub while you watch the sunset. In the morning, set out to explore Walt Disney World, 8-miles from Reunion Resort. 

Built for big families, Magical Mansion puts a little extra thought into making everyone comfortable with its generous amount of seating in each area. The spacious kitchen has a large breakfast bar island with stools, which is a great place to gather before heading out for the night. If you’re staying in, throw the big game on the widescreen and gather on the 2 L-shaped couches. Mix up a few drinks at the wet bar and challenge a friend to a game of pool or see who can beat the high score on pinball.

During your stay, you’ll have shared access to the amenities at Reunion Resort. The Jack Nicklaus Golf Course, of which you’ll have a green-view, is just a 2-minute walk from home. After the course, take the kids to the Reunion Waterpark or out for a shopping trip in Orlando. Once you’ve spent a few days enjoying the magic of Disney, venture on to Universal Studios which is within 20-miles. If you’d rather take it easy, check yourself into Reunion’s spa and enjoy a secluded afternoon to yourself. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Entertain and relax with family and friends to your heart’s content at The Wildwood. This incredible South Lake Tahoe estate boasts 6,200 square feet of living space, seven bedrooms and amenities that make it feel like your own private mountain resort. And with a location less than 10 minutes from the beach and skiing at Heavenly, you’re close to activities no matter when you take your holiday.

Enjoy the California summer from outdoor living spaces with a furnished deck, heat lamps and a hot tub. If there’s snow on the ground, you’ll find plenty to do indoors thanks to a games room with pool, ping-pong and foosball tables and a wet bar; an indoor pool; a sauna; a cable TV and Wi-Fi. There’s even an 18-seat home theater.

The villa’s huge open-concept living spaces let you savor the luxury of spending time together. Cozy up to a gas fireplace, seat sixteen around the dining table or have a snack at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen—all in the open-plan great room. Details like oversized picture windows, polished wood paneling and a stone fireplace surround give the house a rustic charm.

The Wildwood has two honeymoon-worthy bedrooms with king beds, gas fireplaces and en-suite bathrooms with jetted tubs, and one bedroom with two double beds and an en-suite bathroom. There is also one bedroom with one double bed, one with a double bed plus twin bed, and two bedrooms with two double beds each; these four share two Jack-and-Jill-style bathrooms.

Not only is this vacation rental superbly appointed, it’s also conveniently located. It’s less than a 10-minute drive from Lakeside Beach, the ski area at Heavenly Mountain Resort, the Edgewood Tahoe Golf Course and the towns of Stateline and South Lake Tahoe.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take in snow-capped peaks, ski slopes and forest from the perfectly named Goldenview Estate. From its perch in the Baldy Mountain area, this expansive Colorado vacation rental offers incredible views—plus a location close to some of the best skiing in Breckenridge. Even better, its five bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to twenty friends on a ski holiday or an extended family celebrating a birthday or anniversary.

In warmer weather, entertain outdoors on a two-level private deck with a barbecue, firepit and saltwater hot tub. When it’s cooler outside, stay indoors around the cable TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi and wet bar, read by the fireplace or put on a movie in the media room. For your comfort, the villa also has heating, air conditioning and laundry facilities.

This luxury residence shows off its Colorado roots in its log beams and stone accents. Its 5,000 square feet of living space are centered on the open-plan great room, which has sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances and a breakfast bar. Oversized windows flood the room with light and frame views of the Tenmile Range.

There are four bedrooms in the main house at Goldenview Estate: two with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and one with a king bed and one with two double bunk beds that share a bathroom. The fifth bedroom is a guest suite with a queen bed, en-suite bathroom, kitchenette and fireplace, perfect for in-laws wanting quiet or a couple seeking honeymoon-style privacy. It also has a loft with an additional queen mattress.

The estate is less than a 10-minute drive from the heart of Breckenridge: the town’s National Historic District, shopping and dining along Main Street, and sledding and tubing in Carter Park. If you’ve come for the area’s skiing, it’s less than a 5-mile drive to both the Skyway Skiway ski run and the BreckConnect gondola.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stay within a 10-minute drive of golf, polo and the Coachella festival grounds at Polo Villas - 4 Bedroom. Not only is this Desert Cities vacation rental in an ideal location, its half-acre lot and 4,000 square feet of indoor space are perfect for entertaining and relaxing. Invite up to ten guests for a getaway with friends, small family reunion, business retreat or even a quiet California destination wedding.

This luxury property is laid out around a sunny terrace with a pool, hot tub, barbecue, row of loungers, and sitting and dining areas. Borrow the provided bicycles to explore the neighborhood (or even ride to the polo grounds), then return to stretch out in front of the Apple TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.

Inside the Polo Villas - 4 Bedroom, the L-shaped great room features sitting and dining areas that open to the pool terrace via wide sliding glass doors. A fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar links the two areas, and throughout the space, neutral tones and sleek furnishings are set off by colorful artwork and vibrant throw pillows.

The villa has two master bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, and two bedrooms with queen beds that share a Jack-and-Jill bathroom. Larger parties can make use of an extra bedroom with two twin beds and access to a hall bathroom if desired.

Whether you’re escaping to the area on honeymoon like the Hollywood stars of yore or simply seeking a holiday in the sunshine, there’s plenty to do around Polo Villas. It’s a 5-minute walk from the property to the Coachella festival grounds, and less than a 10-minute drive to four golf courses, downtown Indio and shopping in Old Town La Quinta. For a look at the region’s stunning natural scenery, take a day trip to Joshua Tree National Park or ride the Palm Springs Aerial Tramway; for a look at its manmade surroundings, check out the mid-century architecture in downtown Palm Springs.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Terra Nova is an unforgettable property nestled in the heart of Sonoma Valley. Located on 3 acres of beautifully landscaped natural abundance, the lovely five-bedroom villa draws its influences from Mediterranean villas with subtle accents that are pure wine country contemporary. The exterior features earth tones and an infusion of natural materials, allowing the villa to blend in perfectly with its pastoral surroundings. Best of all, you won’t have to go far to begin your appreciation of America’s best wineries.

A majestic oak anchors the circular driveway, its boughs waving hello. You’ll find numerous outdoor living spaces surrounding the villa. A range of patios, verandas, and terraces provide you with distinct - and distinguished - settings for enjoying the beauty of the countryside. One patio, extending from the kitchen, sheltered by an arched ceiling, features a cozy dining alcove with a stone fireplace. Another outdoor terrace houses a lengthy al fresco table where you and your guests can enjoy leisurely brunches and dining under the stars.

Inside, the large great room is a sight to behold. Stunning antiques and carefully selected furnishings create an elegant and welcome ambiance. Feel a fresh breeze wind its way through French doors, as you relax on ultra-comfortable sofas and chairs. At the head of the great room, with a massive stone fireplace, an immense wooden dining table awaits any banquet you may wish to serve, or you can choose to enjoy the services of Villa Terra Nova private chefs or Sonoma County caterers. Sonoma Valley’s reputation for food cannot be overstated, and Villa Terra Nova’s professional grade kitchen will allow you to make the most of locally-sourced ingredients. 

You’ll find five spectacular bedrooms in the villa, individually decorated with a particular color in mind. The spacious Master suite features an office, walk-in closet and spacious en-suite bathroom with soaking tub and rain shower overlooking an enclosed garden featuring seasonal colors. Three of the Villa's guest bedrooms have their own en-suite bathroom as well.

The property is a mere 4 miles from the historic Sonoma Plaza, where shops, restaurants and cafés await you. From there you can start your tour of the Sonoma tasting trails, selecting from hundreds of world-class wineries and iconic wine country towns that not only offer fine wine, but unforgettable culinary experiences year-round. Located in the center of the Sonoma Valley, guests are within minutes of nearby Kenwood and Glen Ellen with a scenic 30 minute drive to the Napa Valley.

Sonoma County Vacation Rental TOT Certificate #1047N

Located just off Baldy Mountain Road, perched above Breckenridge’s historic Main Street, this ultra-luxurious ski villa is ready to host your next exciting Luxury Retreat in beautiful Colorado. Whether you’re in town to ski or enjoy the summer, the many resorts and vibrant mountain villages of Colorado are packed with plenty of exciting attractions. Within five miles, you’ll have ski access to BreckConnect Gondola and Quicksilver Super 6. Travel a little further, and you’ll hit Copper Mountain Ski Resort.

Lofty Fox’s living room features an extra-high coffered wood ceiling over top of the gorgeous two-sided stone fireplace, which sits opposite the massive, mountain-view framing windows. Upon arrival, you’ll instantly feel the warmth and luxury of this rustic-chic ski lodge. Plush leather sofas, stately wooden accents and furniture, and top of the line electronics are found throughout the spacious interior, ensuring guests feel the villas traditional roots, as well as enjoy state of the art amenities. In the kitchen, your inner chef will be inspired by the restaurant caliber appliances, wood cabinetry, and granite countertops. When it’s time for bed, Lofty Fox has a wide range of luxurious accommodations for up to eighteen guests.

After a long day on the slopes, you can return home to a heated garage, a mud room for any wet gear, and a rejuvenating hot tub on the balcony. Once you’re ready to continue your evening, decide whether you’ll be dining in the formal dining area, with space for ten, or if you’d rather an alfresco meal on the balcony. After dinner, you’ll have television, Wi-Fi, a sound system, and a DVD player to help enjoy a relaxing evening with the family.

If you feel like a night out, Breckenridge’s Main Street is lined with delicious restaurants, boutique shops, and plenty of exciting nightlife establishments. If you’re traveling in the summer months, Breckenridge Golf Club is a beautifully scenic and challenging course, a must-play for any golf aficionado.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Ski-in, ski-out gondola access pairs with sophisticated lodge style at Sunshine Mountain. Part of the exclusive One Steamboat Place resort, this Steamboat Springs vacation rental is just minutes from some of the best skiing in Colorado. The three bedrooms in this luxury private residence can accommodate up to eight guests, and the resort’s first-class amenities make for a memorable family vacation or holiday with friends.

Guests of Sunshine Mountain are welcome to use the shared pools, hot tubs, fitness center and games room at One Steamboat Place. There’s also a wine cellar, tasting room and spa for grown-ups, and a children’s center for younger visitors. If you’ll be entertaining during your stay, the villa has its own deck with a barbecue and lounge furniture, as well as an inviting media room.

The rich colors, natural textures and luxe finishes found throughout One Steamboat Place are in abundance inside Sunshine Mountain. Tones of apple red and chocolate brown lend a welcoming appeal to the villa’s open-plan great room, and the gas fireplace is a warm focal point for the sectional and leather armchairs. There’s seating for ten in rustic ladder-back chairs around the dining table, and even more room at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.

Sunshine Mountain has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms and one bedroom with two double beds and a shared bathroom. The media room has a sofa bed and en-suite bathroom, so larger parties can easily use the space as a fourth bedroom.

While the nearest lift is just a minute away from the villa—and easily reached on skis—the resort also provides a seasonal shuttle service for guests. Don’t miss a visit to the area’s namesake hot springs, whether you take the kids to Steamboat Springs Old Town to play in the pools or your sweetheart to Strawberry Park for some honeymoon-worthy stargazing amid the natural rock formations. For summer visitors, the Rollingstone Ranch golf course is known for its fast greens and is less than 2 miles from the resort.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stone paths lead the way to this cypress-forest hideaway straight out of a fairy tale—but actually in Carmel-by-the-Sea. Tucked into a garden verdant with ferns and moss, rendered in stone and wood, and covered with flowering vines, the oceanfront cottage has a wonderfully romantic feel. Follow the Pacific Coast Highway along granite cliffs into downtown Carmel for a gallery walk or wine tasting.

Listen to the surf crashing against the rocks from outdoor sitting areas and, after watching the sun set into the Pacific, linger under the stars around the outdoor fireplace. While the cottage is a hand-crafted stone retreat, it does have modern perks such as a satellite TV, Wi-Fi, espresso machine, and an exercise room.

 All of California’s natural beauty, from the forests to the rocky coast, is showcased in the cottage’s natural materials—and framed by its glass walls facing the water. Cognac leather chairs and olive-green tufted sofas bring earth tones into the living room, and you’ll find the same green around the dining table for 10 and in the countertop of the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

 This luxury property has two bedrooms with king beds and private bathrooms, making it an ideal vacation rental for two couples, a small family, or one couple wanting a honeymoon-style escape to the coast. Like the common living areas, the bedrooms feature dramatic pairings of smooth glass and rough-hewn stone and wood.

 Seven Coves sits close to the famed scenery of Point Lobos State Park, where cypress forest meets coastal cliffs and churning waters. If you fall in love with the landscape (as countless painters have), drive the 6 miles into Carmel-by-the-Sea to pick up a painting by a local artist. If you want to add beach time to your Big Sur holiday, put your toes in the sand at Monastery Beach, a 6-minute drive away.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Stay in the shadow of Lone Mountain—and within steps of the ski slopes—at Swift Bear Lodge. This contemporary Big Sky vacation rental offers year-round access to the best of Montana’s outdoor adventures. Luxury amenities will help you relax after a day outside, and five bedrooms can comfortably accommodate a group of fifteen friends or extended family.

Swift Bear Lodge features outdoor living areas with a barbecue and a private hot tub, for summer guests or visitors wanting a soak after a day of skiing. Inside, the villa has a wood-burning fireplace, pool table, TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi. Boot dryers, ski storage and laundry facilities mean your gear will always be ready for the next day’s activities.

The lodge is laid out around an open-concept great room with a sitting area, dining table for ten and a fully equipped kitchen. The space is flooded with sunlight and mountain views thanks to oversized windows, and gets a cozy vibe from exposed wood beams. You’ll find a TV and the pool table in a separate games room on the lower level.

The villa has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a jetted tub. One bedroom with a king bed and one bedroom with a twin-over-double bunk bed share a bathroom. The fifth bedroom has two twin-over-double bunk beds, a queen sleeper sofa and an en-suite bathroom.

If you’ve come out west for a ski holiday, the lodge’s Mountain Village location delivers. You’ll enjoy ski-in, ski-out access to the White Otter lift, and can reach the Big Sky Resort base in just 5 minutes by car. In warmer weather, play a round at Big Sky Golf Course or make the easy hike to the stunning Ousel Falls.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Where the mountains meet downtown you’ll find Main Street Contempo. Though it’s set above the shops and restaurants of Park City’s charming Main Street, this stylish apartment is only a few minutes’ walk from the Park City Town ski lift. Invite up to eleven friends or family members to live like locals at this convenient five-bedroom vacation rental.

Watch life unfold in town from a pair of chairs on the street-facing balcony—or see the stars come out during a honeymoon-worthy soak in the hot tub on the private rooftop deck, which also features a barbecue. After a day on the slopes, serve refreshments from the wet bar or wine cooler and settle in front of the gas fireplace and cable TV, all to the strains of the Sonos sound system.

Pale wood floors, neutral tones and an open-plan layout give Main Street Contempo its modern flair, while a wall of windows in the great room brings the natural scenery outside into the space as well. A generous sectional and several chairs offer ample seating close to the fireplace and TV, and there’s room for eight around the dining table. A granite-topped breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances make the fully equipped kitchen a pleasure to look at—and to cook in.

The five bedrooms at this luxury property all have en-suite bathrooms, making it perfect for groups who want privacy while on holiday. There are three bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with its own fireplace, and one bedroom with a queen bed. Younger guests will want to claim the bunk bed and twin bed in the fifth bedroom as their own.

Thanks to its downtown location, Main Street Contempo is only a 2-minute walk from the nearest ski lift, as well as local favorites like the Park Silly Sunday Market. By car, it’s 5 minutes or less to the base of both Park City Mountain Resort and Deer Valley resort, plus, for summer visitors, Park City Golf Course. Don’t miss the chance to visit the nearby Utah Olympic Park, where you can tour the facilities and try out a thrilling bobsled ride.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Rustic charm pairs with a great Steamboat Springs location at Brown Bear Chalet. Fitted with wood trim and natural stone, and set beside a national forest where you just might see its namesake, this luxury vacation rental is a short walk from the nearest ski lift and a short drive from downtown, golf and more. Bring family for a winter getaway or memorable reunion, or friends for a cozy ski holiday in Colorado’s so-called Ski Town USA.

Your stay in the Bear Chalets community includes private shuttle service to the nearest chairlift. At the end of a day on the slopes, leave your gear in the storage cupboards, hang your boots on the dryers and let the villa’s elevator whisk you upstairs or down. Enjoy a favorite movie on the flat-screen television with surround sound, test your skill around the pool table or challenge the kids on the video game system. The villa also opens to its own deck and terrace with a barbecue, dining table and hot tub, for cookouts on sunny days and soaks on winter nights.

Brown Bear Chalet is laid out around a spacious open-plan great room, where soaring ceilings, exposed wooden beams, a stone fireplace and a hunting trophy lend a classic mountain-lodge feel. Buttery leather sofas and chairs and a dining table with seating for ten are both stylish and comfortable. In the adjacent fully equipped kitchen, gourmet appliances, alder cabinets, granite counters and a breakfast bar will inspire cooks and diners alike.

Each of the chalet’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom, for hotel-worthy accommodations in a private setting. There are three bedrooms with king beds and one with two bunk beds that’s ideal for children.

During your time at Brown Bear, you’ll have the choice of walking to the Thunderhead lift, taking the shuttle or making the 5-minute drive yourself to Steamboat Ski Resort. In the summer, it’s also a quick drive to the fast greens and challenging holes of Rollingstone Ranch Golf Club. Be sure to spend an afternoon playing in the pools at Steamboat Springs Old Town or an evening reliving your honeymoon with some stargazing from the hot springs at Strawberry Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Make beachfront living part of your California dreamin’ at El Matador Beach House. This contemporary Malibu estate rests on the sands of El Matador State Beach and offers panoramic views of the Pacific from living areas indoors and out. Its location close to golf, parks and more makes it the perfect base to explore greater Los Angeles, and its six bedrooms can accommodate up to eight friends or family members.

Perched on the oceanfront behind the gates of an exclusive community, this luxury vacation rental practically has its toes in the water. Enjoy the views from several levels of terraces featuring lounge furniture, a barbecue and an al-fresco dining table. The villa also features an indoor spa area with a private lap pool, hot tub and sauna.

Contemporary architecture and modern furnishings give El Matador Beach House a vibe of breezy seaside chic. Double-height ceilings and large windows fill the rooms with sunshine, while thoughtful layouts divide them into more intimate nooks. Though the bright, airy living and dining rooms share a wall, they’re separated by a short flight of steps. The fully equipped kitchen is equally bright thanks to a bank of skylights, but practical, too, with state-of-the-art appliances and a breakfast nook and bar.

Relive your honeymoon in the villa’s master bedroom, which has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, two fireplaces, a lounge area and a furnished balcony overlooking the ocean. There are two other bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, one of which has a jetted tub, and two bedrooms with shared bathrooms: one with a double bed, and one with a queen bed and kitchenette.

A Malibu holiday is perfect for relaxing on the beach or taking advantage of the region’s activities. Try out surfing at one of the five beaches within 12 miles—or head to Malibu Pier for lunch at its trendy restaurant. The villa is just a short drive from the fairways of Perenchio Golf Course and the trails of Topanga State Park, as well as from more cultural attractions like the Getty Villa and Getty Center.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in the “City of Festivals” Indio, this serene five-bedroom offers the seclusion of the Montage gated community, while you spend your vacation exploring the vibrant desert cities of California. Whether you’re in town for a festival, golf trip with friends, or a family vacation, Villa Serenity is the paradise you’ve been searching for. With an incredible back patio, spacious group-friendly interiors, and elegant spaces for formal occasions, Serenity is ready for anything you can dream up for your next Luxury Retreat.

Serenity’s back patio is a tropical oasis. Gorgeous natural stonework, mature palm trees, lush greenery, and bright decor make this desert home feel like it’s hidden deep in the jungle. The saltwater swimming pool and gas fire pit further enhance the wild feel of this secluded paradise. Inside, Serenity switches gears a little and moves in an elegant Spanish colonial direction with its relaxing cream tones, designer furniture, and dark stained wood beams and cabinetry. The living room brings back the intricate stonework of the patio in its beautiful accent wall, containing the fireplace and wide screen television. In the kitchen, there’s plenty of functional working space, granite countertops, and state of the art appliances. And, just off the kitchen, a chic dining room awaits, with seating for eight.

Designed to entertain, Serenity has something fun for everyone, like a billiards table, hot tub, barbecue, and even a putting green. Inside, you’ll have cable television, Wi-Fi, stereo, air conditioning, and washer/dryer. And, three of Serenity’s bedrooms feature king sized beds and en-suite bathrooms, while the others are great for sharing to accommodate up to fourteen people.

Within ten miles of Serenity, you’ll find numerous golf courses, the closest being the country clubs of Indian Palms and Motorcoach, both are just a five-minute drive. If you’re in town for the festivals, the Coachella Festival Grounds and downtown Indio are just five minutes away. And, travel a little further, and you can visit Joshua Tree National Park, one of California’s most celebrated natural landscapes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The perfect home base for your large group, this South Tahoe estate is like having a mountain resort all to yourself. Inside, there are numerous lounge areas, a well-equipped games room that leads to a home theatre, an indoor pool, hot tub, and sauna, and nine luxurious bedrooms. Outside, several balconies and living spaces capture soaring mountain views. Within a five minute walk, you’ll find world-class skiing at the base of Heavenly Mountain Resort. And, within just ten miles, you’ll have access to Lakeside Beach, Lake Tahoe Golf Course, and South Tahoe’s vibrant downtown area.

First and foremost, Saddle Estate is mountain luxury at its finest. Rustic elements like rock walls, cedar siding, granite counters, wood flooring, and plush leather furniture give the house that natural warmth you look for in a ski vacation. On the flip side, Saddle Estate’s high-end electronics, stainless steel appliances, and modern architectural take on the traditional ski lodge make this mountain home a stylish standout. You’ll love the open concept layout and all the extra space it creates for your large group.

At dinner, Saddle Estate’s spacious kitchen is sure to inspire culinary creativity with its restaurant caliber appliances and functional layout. The formal dining area is just beyond the breakfast bar, a large contemporary picnic style table, with seating for eighteen. Outside, there’s a built-in barbecue, and a fire pit, in case you feel like doing some grilling.

Whether you’re in town to ski, golf, or enjoy the dynamic natural landscape, South Tahoe is always an exciting vacation destination. The best spot to enjoy the lake is Lakeside Beach. There, you’ll find calm water and a vast stretch of sand outfitted with picnic tables, gazebos, and the Lakeside Grill. After a day by the lake, head to downtown South Tahoe for dinner and drinks, their nightlife scene is buzzing all year round. With everything from fine dining to dance clubs and dive bars, South Tahoe has something for everyone.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

PERMIT #7715

listing.listing_description:
This beautiful estate is nestled amid the Alexander Valley AVA in Sonoma County, just outside the town of Healdsburg and close to numerous renowned wineries. The vintage ranch house is ideal for a memorable getaway with loved ones, featuring a private outdoor swimming pool, beautiful alfresco living and dining areas, and luminous, superbly appointed interiors (including a gourmet kitchen and home office). Three ample bedrooms accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to six in size.

The estate offers a serene haven for carefree relaxation and festive delights in the heart California Wine Country. Enjoy long days and evenings on the pool terrace, swimming in the refreshing water, basking in the sun, and gathering in the lounge areas with glasses of local wine. Fire up the barbecue grill on the deck in the evening, and relish an alfresco meal at the table for eight.

The interiors possess the quintessential Sonoma balance of rustic spirit and a welcoming, modern elegance. The open-concept living and dining room features a comfy lounge with large TV, a sitting area by the fireplace, and a beautiful table for six. Cooks will adore the bright and airy kitchen, with ample prep space, an island breakfast bar, top-of-the-line appliances, and a farmhouse-style table. Excellent media features include Apple TV and Sonos sound. Central air conditioning and heating keep you comfortable in all seasons.

The bedrooms are furnished with an uncluttered simplicity, featuring comfortable bedding, serene natural light, and evocative touches of artwork and décor. The master bedroom includes a king bed and a spacious bathroom with dual vanity, walk-in shower, and lovely clawfoot soaking tub. There is one guest suite with a king bed and one with a queen; both enjoy ensuite bathrooms, and the queen suite opens to a private, screened-in terrace.

The Healdsburg area includes three renowned wine producing AVAs—Alexander Valley, Russian River, and Dry Creek—and several of the top wineries in North America. You're also an easy drive to Santa Rosa, featuring fabulous cultural attractions, restaurants, and markets. The beaches at Bodega Bay are within comfortable driving distance.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Add a little luxury to your ski vacation with a stay at Silver Strike - 3 Bedroom + Den. This stylish three-bedroom Utah vacation rental near Park City couldn’t be more convenient, with ski-in ski-out access to the slopes at Deer Valley and a chairlift at your doorstep. But its well-appointed living spaces, state-of-the-art features and cozy layout make the property a private retreat, perfect for a family looking to escape to the mountains or a honeymoon for true powder enthusiasts.

Your stay at Silver Strike - 3 Bedroom + Den includes access to the shared amenities at Silver Strike Lodge, from ski equipment lockers and a fitness center to a huge free-form outdoor hot tub. The villa has its own underground parking space, and, above ground, spectacular views of the mountains and a terrace and balcony from which to enjoy them.

Textures of stone, wood and fur give the interiors of Silver Strike - 3 Bedroom + Den all the welcoming appeal of classic mountain lodges, while modern prints lend a fresh, contemporary vibe. In the great room, the rustic look of an imposing stone fireplace, exposed wood beams and antler chandeliers are balanced by large windows with mountain views, sleek chrome-legged lounge chairs and clean-lined tuxedo-style sofas. A vibrant red rug and bold ikat-print drapes meld traditional patterns and up-to-date style in the formal dining area, which seats eight. And in the fully equipped kitchen, you’ll find a practical breakfast bar and top-of-the-line appliances.

Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom. The master suite features five-star amenities like a king bed, jetted tub, fireplace and balcony, and the other two bedrooms have inviting queen beds. For families traveling with kids or larger groups of friends, there are two additional bunk beds available.

Silver Strike - 3 Bedroom + Den gives you direct access to the slopes at Deer Valley Resort, via the Silver Strike Express Chairlift that’s practically at the villa’s door. For apres-ski shopping, dining and entertainment, visit downtown Park City, about 3 miles away; for more jaw-dropping Western scenery or a rafting adventure, head to Brown’s Canyon, 15 miles away. Stop off for an afternoon or take an extra day or two in downtown Salt Lake City, 35 miles away, on your way to and from Salt Lake City International Airport, 39 miles from the villa.

Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Palm Springs Registered Tax #3741

The Mesa Ridge is a spectacular luxury villa in Palm Springs. Situated on the historic MGM Studio lands about two miles from downtown and a short walk to Moorten Botanical Garden, the Mediterranean-style villa enjoys dreamy views of the Sonoran Desert hills, ample and beautiful alfresco living areas, exquisite interiors, and four deluxe bedrooms. For family reunions, golf vacations with friends, or a home base during Coachella or the Palm Springs Film Festival, the Mesa Ridge is an outstanding choice.

Nestled amid lovely desert gardens, the villa has the air of an enchanted oasis, its swimming pool like a blue lagoon. Multiple lovely sitting areas offer ample room for cocktail parties or luxurious relaxation. Enjoy bathing in the hot tub, floating in the pool's crystalline waters, and sunbathing on elegant loungers. Spend afternoons in the beautiful alfresco pavilion, cooking meals and mixing cocktails at the kitchen, kindling a fire in the superb hearth, and relaxing in the lounge. The fireplace and heat lamps allow you to linger on the terrace at night, gazing at the spectacular sky.

The interior living area—decorated by Canadian designer James McIntyre—provides an ideal setting for entertaining and relaxation. Sip cocktails in the spacious and luminous lounge. Stay toasty with a California red by the fireplace. Open the glass doors and step out onto the balcony to behold the sublime vistas. Cook fabulous meals in the fully equipped kitchen, serving tapas at the bar, and join each other at the gorgeous table for eight. At night, cuddle in the cozy media lounge with your favorite films.

The four bedrooms include a master suite with king bed and three guestroom with queen beds. The master suite opens to a beautiful balcony with expansive views, and has an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. One of the queen rooms opens to the terrace. With room for eight, the villa is an excellent vacation rental for destination wedding guests.

The Mesa Ridge balances serene privacy with convenient access to Palm Springs and its environs. You're just a few minutes from downtown and the Palm Springs Art Museum, while golfers are within minutes of Indian Canyons, Mesquite, and Escena. The Coachella Festival Grounds are just twenty-three miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The gondola glides by overhead and the pool stretches out below Morningside Ridge 608. This stunning slopeside vacation rental is part of the Edgemont community in Steamboat Springs, giving you access to the Stampede ski run and exclusive amenities. Invite up to six friends or family members to join you for a relaxed ski holiday or an outdoor adventure in the postcard-worthy Colorado scenery.

Your stay at Morningside Ridge 608 includes access to the shared ski storage, boot dryers, heated outdoor pool and hot tub, as well as the seasonal shuttle. Two private balconies give you panoramic views from the Flat Tops to Sand Mountain, and there’s a barbecue for warmer nights. On snowy evenings, pour a glass from the wine cooler and cozy up to the fireplace to enjoy a favorite show on the flat-screen television or share photos of the day’s best runs via Wi-Fi.

A generous open-plan layout makes the villa ideal for groups, and the furnishings balance rustic inspiration with modern comfort. Read, nap or watch television on the sofas while the fireplace crackles softly in the background, or sit down to a hearty après-ski meal in the jaunty striped chairs around the dining table. Sleek stools at the breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances lend a bit of contemporary edge to the fully equipped kitchen.

This luxury villa has a standout master bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, mountain views and a fireplace; it also opens to the balcony. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds and share a hallway bathroom. Wood trim, checked throws and details such as woven wall hangings or vintage doors lend warmth and personality to the bedrooms.

Each morning, simply grab your gear and head down to the first floor of the Edgemont complex for ski-in, ski-out access to the Stampede run at Steamboat Ski Resort. The villa is also close to shopping, dining and nightlife in the mountain village. If the hills are more green than white, book a tee time at the nearby Rollingstone Ranch golf course or a kayaking or rafting expedition on the Yampa River. No matter what time of year, it’s well worth visiting the town’s hot springs; try lively Old Town for a family-friendly experience or romantic Strawberry Park for a honeymoon-worthy soak.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Carve the fresh powder of Park City Mountain Resort and walk home to barbecue dinners and hot tub soaks at this superb contemporary residence. Situated in the prestigious Old Town neighborhood, the 3-story home has everything you need for an alpine getaway with family and friends. Enjoy home-cooked feasts after an adventurous day and head over to Main Street for some of the finest apres-ski nightlife in the Rocky Mountains.

Powder Watch is centered around an open-concept living room with gourmet kitchen. Large windows fill the space with natural daylight and evening alpenglow, while beautiful wood trusses evoke the rustic charm of old Park City. Sip hot cocoa by the fire and put on a movie. For a little more privacy, the master suite, on the lower level, features its own fireplace and balcony with inspiring views of the ski slopes.

There is hardly a finer location in Park City for travellers seeking that perfect balance of privacy and proximity. The villa’s ski storage room and garage are about 150 yards from the base of the mountain at Quttin’ Time run, and an easy walk from the restaurants, bars, and music venues of Historic Main Street. Park City Golf Course is also within easy reach by car. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Construction Note: Please note that there is construction near to this villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Slopeside Manor is the definition of mountain luxury and a destination unto its own. This magnificent custom six bedroom, six and a half bath residence was built by one of Breckenridge’s premier luxury homebuilder. As you enter this seven thousand square foot masterpiece, you are warmly greeted by an entry that overlooks the great room. With five king bedrooms, a spacious bunkroom and four outdoor living areas, this captivating estate was designed for special gatherings and pure alpine bliss.

Care to enjoy some bowling? You and your guests can do so at One Ski Hill Place. Take a dip in the pool and swim off the stress of the day to day. Slopeslide Manor features endless amenities including a full wet bar, game room and fireplace, as well as pool, ping pong table and shuffleboard tables and gaming tables. The media room is equipped with a nine foot screen, surround sound, ten reclining leather chairs and a wet bar area with extra seating for five. The kids have a space all their own in the large bunk room that features bean bag chairs and a flat screen television with an Xbox. Step outside to relish the outdoor living area with a fire pit and a private hot tub for nine.

The gourmet kitchen features a double-stack oven, two dishwashers, built-in refrigerator and a Thermador stove. Fine dining is guaranteed with seating for five at the large curved granite island complimented by a beautiful dining area that seats ten. Let us know, and the staff will pre-stock the villa or set up activities and excursions for you and your guests.

With a total of six exquisite bedrooms Slopeside Manor can accommodate up to twenty-two guests. Each bedroom includes king or twin sized bunk beds, an en-suite bathroom with shower and a television. Get the rest and relaxation your body deserves at your very own mountain chalet.

Slopeside Manor is only a jaunt from the town of Breckenridge where you can enjoy resplendent galleries, decadent restaurants and a great nightlife. Family reunions or groups of friends, Slopeside Manor will provide anything and everything you need for a memorable alpine holiday! With all sorts of activities including skiing, snowboarding, snowshoeing, hiking, and many more, Colorado mountain adventures are endless year round!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step under the rich wooden eaves of this mountain mansion to begin your fairytale vacation in the Rockies. The galleried central living area makes an instant impression, with the warmth and stone authority of the huge fireplace offering a welcome return after a day spent skiing or snowboarding. With sweeping views from the bedroom and study windows, guests are minutes from happening Breckenridge.

The sheer grandeur of Windwood Estate is evident as soon as guests arrive via the spacious driveway, with the robust, wooden exteriors harking back to the 19th century origins of this community. Inside, guests can take in the striking, hardwood furnishings that add to every spacious room, while special touches like the magnificent antler chandelier references the wild fauna of Colorado that roam nearby. The enveloping, luxurious bathrooms will be particularly appealing to guests who are looking to relax after a day experiencing what the nearby Breckenridge resort has to offer.

While the interior delights of Windwood Estate are attractive, guests will of course be attracted to the natural scenes and winter sports of the nearby hillsides. Just a couple of minutes drive away, the local gondola will deposit fun-loving guests onto the high-altitude of Peak 8, which features some of the best-loved runs in the Rockies. Guests are also just a few minutes from excellent golfing, all the nightlife and culinary options of the town itself, plus hiking, mountain biking and fishing in the valley at large.

listing.listing_description:
An Orlando vacation gets a dose of whimsy on a stay at this playfully themed Four Corners mansion. On the outside, the Mediterranean-inspired villa looks like any other in the Reunion gated resort community; on the inside, it has unique spaces like a drive-in-style movie theater and hot-air-balloon bedroom. Walk to the resort water park and drive 9 minutes to Disney World.

Swim, sun, and serve drinks on a backyard patio overlooking the Reunion golf-course pond. There’s a pool and hot tub, plenty of loungers, and a shaded alfresco dining area with a barbecue. After a day on the fairways or at a theme park, rack up the balls on the taxi-themed pool table or cue up a family favorite in a home theater that feels like going to your own private drive-in.

Just off the patio is an open-concept great room with a sitting area, dining area for 9, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. Wicker furniture keeps things light, as does a playful little gator sculpture. Things get really fun in the bedrooms, though, where you’ll find hot-air balloon, shipwreck, and space themes for grown-ups and a treehouse theme in a children’s bunk room.

Stay and play in the Reunion resort community, where it’s a 9-minute walk to the water park and a 3-minute drive to the first hole of the golf course, or spend days at Orlando’s theme parks. It’s a 9-minute drive to Disney World and 20 miles to Universal Studios.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The Wolf Mountain suite at One Steamboat Place provides an ideal sanctuary and maximal convenience for enjoying a Rocky Mountain ski vacation with family and friends. With four bedrooms accommodating ten people, this luxury vacation rental includes access to world-class lodge amenities literally steps from the Steamboat Gondola.

Wolf Mountain's open-plan living area features tall glass doors gazing out on Steamboat vistas, opening to a private outdoor patio with Viking grill. In the lounge, a deluxe couch and thick leather armchairs surround the central stone hearth, with its flat screen television and wood-burning fireplace, perfect for keeping toasty at night. Beside the lounge, the beautiful wooden dining table seats ten, while the fully equipped kitchen with Viking appliances includes a breakfast bar for three. The suite also includes an iMac computer with high-speed WiFi, and both air conditioning and heating for keeping cozy any time of year.

The bedrooms are ideal for sweet rest and private quiet time. On one side of the suite, the master bedroom features a king size bed, large windows, a stone hearth with gas fireplace, a flat screen television, and a comfy armchair. The ensuite bathroom includes a stand-alone steam shower and jetted tub. On the other side of the suite, the guest master has a king bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The third bedroom has a king bed, while the fourth has two queens, and both have ensuite bathrooms with shower/tub combo.

Guests at One Steamboat Place enjoy access to its top-shelf mountain lodge offerings. Savor a well-earned soak in the outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, and relax in the classic Great Room, with its massive stone fireplace and mountain views. There's also a game parlor and a Little Tykes Room for kids.

For skiing and enjoying all of Steamboat's delights, your location is unparalleled. To hit the slopes in the morning, you're just a minute's walk from Steamboat Gondola. For fine, Rocky Mountain golf, drive a few minutes to Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course. And if your body aches from conquering the slopes, let the mountains be your spa at Strawberry Park Natural Hot Springs, just ten miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Pull into the grand driveway of this Santa Barbara home and anticipate the special quality of what awaits you; the pinnacle of modern living. The villa’s rich wooden floors, stone fireplace, tasteful living space and dream kitchen are complimented by a lush, lengthy garden and shady barbecue patio. Find yourself just a short drive from Santa Barbara harbor and the leisure of Butterfly Beach.

From the moment you wake, the pleasures of this airy Californian villa will impress themselves on you. Balanced AC ensures that the ideal temperature is always present, as you walk into the futuristic, sleek and fully-outfitted kitchen. Emerge to the gentle breeze, swaying trees and pleasant warmth of the outdoor seating area, and choose a comfort seat under the broad sun shades. After a fun excursion to Santa Monica or nearby LA, return for lunch to the airy dining area that blurs the distinction between inside and outside. The home’s fully outfitted media room and sumptuous sitting room, complete with the hospitable glow of the regal fireplace, are ideal for relaxing as evening draws in.

Situated close to the brilliant blue of the Pacific Ocean, Modern Serenity allows guests to get the absolute best from Santa Barbara. Experience all the delights of a beach day with some of the finest beaches in the region just a few kilometres away. Wile away a great day in the sunshine of Stearns Wharf and the nearby downtown, with a huge range of renowned restaurants, cafes and eateries to choose from. Guests are conveniently close to attractions like Santa Barbara zoo, while a huge range of highly rated golf clubs are just a very short drive from this ideally-located home. End the day in adventurous style with a drive into the scene Santa Ynez mountains to the north, where the golden hour illuminates stunning valleys and landmarks like the ruined stone mansion of Knapps Castle. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
No matter what season you visit Sun Valley, there’s always lots of fun and excitement to be had. From the ski slopes to the golf course, this private, five-bedroom vacation home is always ready for an adventure. And, with its central location, you’re never more than a few miles from Sun Valley’s main attractions. There’s plenty of space and sleeping accommodations for ten, making Skyline perfect for a family holiday, a ski or golf trip with friends, or an unforgettable corporate retreat.

Spectacular Mountain views are framed by Skyline’s massive windows, following the contours of the vaulted ceiling, the interior is spacious and one with its natural surroundings. Exposed wood, intricate stonework, and leather couches set a rustic-chic tone throughout. The warmth created in Skyline is both cozy and elegant, perfect for a relaxing night in or a formal dinner party. In the kitchen, beautiful stained-wood cabinetry is punctuated by rich granite countertops. High-end stainless steel appliances will inspire your inner chef. And, the formal dining table is made of authentic raw-wood, with eight chairs to match.

After dinner, head to the lounge, it’s a great spot for a relaxing night with family and friends. There’s a pool table, arcade games, bubble hockey, and an amazing view of the hillside. Cozy up on the plush leather couch and warm yourself by the wood burning fireplace. You could also get a fire going outside, roast some marshmallows, turn on the heat lamps, and enjoy a starry night from the furnished terrace.

If it's golf or skiing you’re after, you’re in luck. Two beautifully scenic courses and two easily accessible chairlifts are located within three miles of Skyline. If you feel like exploring the city, visit downtown Ketchum and check out some of their boutique shops, local restaurants, and vibrant nightlife. You could also spend the night ice skating at the town rink or catch the latest movie at the Magic Lantern Cinema.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
